Changes
=======

1.0 (19-08-2013)
----------------

* Initial version as a fork of `shaunsephton.recipe.uwsgi`_. Update
  the recipe to work with recent version of uwsgi and buildout,
  improve the configuration options and prevent uwsgi to be downloaded
  and compiled each time buildout is ran.

.. _shaunsephton.recipe.uwsgi: http://github.com/shaunsephton/shaunsephton.recipe.uwsgi
